Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Mirage Kothari "Myrage37"
Reviews.Content: I love Android phones and had this for almost a year and a half. I finally couldn't take the freezing and the crappy battery life. STAY AWAY. why would anyone pay for this (a 2 year old model) when there are new models available for the same price.

Reviews.Title: HTC MyTouch 3g
Reviews.Author: Play24
Reviews.Content: Product is great so far and works pretty well, especially with WiFi. Would recommend it, especially for people who like Android smartphones.

Reviews.Title: freeze all the time
Reviews.Author: Obando Crespo Wilman Jose "Wilman O."
Reviews.Content: It was a bad buy, I can not make it work well, freezes, lost signal, strange behavior for a HTC phone

Reviews.Title: It didnt come in red but great item..
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: worked well and durable.. I liked it nd used it for a long time until i upgraded. Perfect for the time used though..

Reviews.Title: i don't recomended
Reviews.Author: rosagobellan
Reviews.Content: to slow dosen't work very well it makes me. mad everytime i want to make a phone call or send a message it gets freeze all the time

Reviews.Title: Can not recognize any sim card
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This phone can not recognize any sim card after six months and the wi-fi is not working as well what a shame

Reviews.Title: frustrating
Reviews.Author: A. Staker "Lucky Mom"
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my daughter.  The paint started chipping within a couple of weeks.  The phone is so different from the touchscreen version, and I didn't realize that when purchasing.  We had had too many issues with the touch screen, so I thought this would be a better fit.  It turns out it wasn't really worth the price.

Reviews.Title: i
Reviews.Author: guadalupe
Reviews.Content: the first two i got the hearing headset did not work the third one works fine im loving it but it turns off automatic when i guess it gets to hot or im over using it but its a great phone the speaker sounds loud great for radio

Reviews.Title: Alright phone, don't order from CellLounge.
Reviews.Author: mlivihun
Reviews.Content: This phone was alright, but it was a little slow. When I first got it, it worked well for a bit, but after about two weeks it started to slow down and it would shut down by itself every few hours. The paint also started chipping on it so I sent it back for a replacement. When I got my replacement I realized it was even worse and the battery only lasted about two hours before the phone would shut off on me. I don't know if it was the phone itself or the company, just DON'T BUY FROM CELL LOUNGE. I've sent them the second phone back and they've told me that they didn't receive it - which I know they have - so I can't get a refund.

Reviews.Title: don't get it, never get another HTC phone anymore
Reviews.Author: happyb8g
Reviews.Content: I've had it for almost two years, and every minute I own it, I want to throw it out of the window because it takes forever to switch apps, making calls... If I weren't waiting for the new Samsung Galaxy S2, this phone would probably end up at the landfill! It also restarts for no reason... imagine you are at a critical point using the GPS navigation, and it turns off and takes about 2 minutes to come back up... and you will probably end up waiting on the side of the road for the navigation to resume!!! HTC sucks!!
